mapper.insert: insert into user_crawl_record (id, user_id, system_code, game_code, crawl_count, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{systemCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gameCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{crawlCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.select: select id, user_id, system_code, game_code, crawl_count, create_time from user_crawl_record
